claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

extracted_evidence.quote: AN EXACT STRAIN MATCH 4 5 The only recombinant flu vaccine that has known and exact antigen content, Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO
